BasicBlocker - Class in com.hac.Blocker
BasicBlocker class provides a basic implementation of a URL blocker by checking the reachability of a given URL.

The key string for the block command.
BlockCommand - Class in com.hac.Command
The BlockCommand class represents the "block url" command in the commands.

Represents file name of Blocked url list.
BlockedOption - Class in com.hac.Blocker
The BlockedOption class is responsible for building the appropriate BlockerCommand instances based on the provided options string.

BlockedUrlBlocker - Class in com.hac.Blocker
The BlockedUrlBlocker class extends BlockerDecorator and implements the BlockerCommand interface, providing a URL blocking mechanism by checking if the URL is in the blocked URLs list.
BlockedUrlBlocker(BlockerCommand) - Constructor for class com.hac.Blocker.BlockedUrlBlocker
Constructor for the BlockedUrlBlocker class.
blockerCommand - Variable in class com.hac.Blocker.BlockerDecorator
The blockerCommand field is a reference to the underlying BlockerCommand that this decorator is wrapping.
BlockerCommand - Interface in com.hac.Blocker
The BlockerCommand interface defines the structure for URL blocking commands.
BlockerDecorator - Class in com.hac.Blocker
The BlockerDecorator abstract class implements the BlockerCommand interface and serves as a base class for various URL blocking decorators.
BlockerDecorator(BlockerCommand) - Constructor for class com.hac.Blocker.BlockerDecorator
Constructor for the BlockerDecorator class.
buildCommands(String) - Static method in class com.hac.Blocker.BlockedOption
Builds a BlockerCommand chain based on the provided options string.
